name: Skinflint
description: '''Skinflint''' is a [[Heavy metal music|heavy metal]] band from [[Gaborone, Botswana]]. They have incorporated elements from African culture into heavy metal music, attracting the attention of international media. Their releases, ''Iklwa'', ''Gauna'' and ''Dipoko'', pay homage to ancestral beliefs and African spirituality, while the band still plays in the vein of [[traditional heavy metal]].
